class.name: PhysicsServer3DRenderingServerHandler
class.brief_description: A class used to provide [method PhysicsServer3DExtension._soft_body_update_rendering_server] with a rendering handler for soft bodies.

method.name: _set_aabb
method.description: Called by the [PhysicsServer3D] to set the bounding box for the [SoftBody3D].

method.name: _set_normal
method.description: Called by the [PhysicsServer3D] to set the normal for the [SoftBody3D] vertex at the index specified by [param vertex_id]. [b]Note:[/b] The [param normal] parameter used to be of type [code]const void*[/code] prior to Godot 4.2.

method.name: _set_vertex
method.description: Called by the [PhysicsServer3D] to set the position for the [SoftBody3D] vertex at the index specified by [param vertex_id]. [b]Note:[/b] The [param vertex] parameter used to be of type [code]const void*[/code] prior to Godot 4.2.

method.name: set_aabb
method.description: Sets the bounding box for the [SoftBody3D].

method.name: set_normal
method.description: Sets the normal for the [SoftBody3D] vertex at the index specified by [param vertex_id].

method.name: set_vertex
method.description: Sets the position for the [SoftBody3D] vertex at the index specified by [param vertex_id].
